Text: ...Report.
We've received word from Lady Zeta.

It appears that members of the Cult members are
closely watching the hideout.

Looks like our plan is working. No sign of anyone
from the Church?
Nothing that can be confirmed at present.

Zeta does confirm, however, that they've dispatched
personnel from the Holy State.

The Holy State—that's one of those city-states
located on the archipelago northwest of the
kingdom.

It's the de facto headquarters of the Church, so they
frequently have people traveling between there and
Lindwurm.

Zeta states that so long as the movement of personnel
takes place according to routine, she's unable to
confirm whether it's related to this case.

Still, she seems to have her suspicions. Most likely,
she's going off her therianthropic instincts.

You mean she thinks the Church is feigning normalcy
to avoid suspicion?

The fact remains that the corpses belonging to the
Cult members were left in the hideout, but someone
had carefully removed all traces of the mysterious
paladin.

Which means that the knight's comrades are present
here in Lindwurm...but have no direct affiliation to
the Cult of Diablos.
Then...

It would have to be someone willing to risk having
their identity exposed...just to ensure they leave
behind no traces.

...There should be movement from the Cult soon.
I'll inform you once we learn anything more.

Oh, and here is the additional boar meat that Lady
Delta requested.
...Say, Lambda, may I ask you a trivial question?

Please feel free to ask me anything, trivial or
otherwise.

Is there a way for elves to eat raw meat without
upsetting their stomach?

Not as far as I'm aware. If there were a way, Master
Shadow would be the one to ask.
I guess that means another day of Epsilon losing it.
I told you, didn't I? You need to grill it properly!

I get bored of eating it grilled every day. Sometimes
I like to eat it raw.

But you said you were going to grill the meat every
day!
Yeah, that's what I'm doing.

I grill it, then eat it raw, grill it, then eat it
raw, grill it, then eat it raw... I grill it three
times a day!

Don't act so smug about it! For starters, six meals a
day is way too many!
Now you're starting sound like that damn cat!
Please say something to her, Lady Alpha!
The smell of boar meat is driving me mad!
...I'm sorry, Epsilon.

To be honest, the more you rant and rave, the more
likely we are to draw their attention.

Besides, we've already confirmed that the enemy we're
looking to lure out has been investigating Lindwurm's
underground ventilation system.

Filling this place daily with the smell of boar meat
is an admirable strategy.

Agh... I understand that—I really do! But Lady
Alphaaa!

Not really sure what's going on, but glad to see
we're on the same page, Lady Alpha!

Just be sure you understand that normally...I would
never allow such an unbalanced diet.
G-Got it...
*munch...munch...gobble...gobble*
Do you think eating raw meat tastes that good?

Epsilon. You mustn't be reckless when it comes to
your diet.

Right, it's just the way Delta eats it makes it look
so delicious!

Wait, don't tell me you're a bit curious as well,
Lady Alpha?
I once saw Shadow eat slices of fish raw.

What?! No way! That's such a bizarre way to eat it,
even for a human! Isn't it...?

But he seemed to enjoy it without suffering from
indigestion. And it wasn't like he took any special
precautions...

Boss man knows all sorts of ways to eat things! He
even taught me a super special method once—
Lady Alpha!
I sensed it too!
It looks like we've lured the rats into our trap.
